Detailed Description

Holds a list of groups, and treats all pairs of neurons of each group (including self-pairs).

This class has a protected constructor, and shall only be called by OutputterImpl. The method iterate is called by the OutputManager, which calls the operation passed in operation_function then. It is a friend of the Group class.
